channel.title: Fixing Castle Wars
channel.description:
Problem: On my private server, I have castle wars but I can't seem to figure out how to make players able to attack other players in the castle wars area. My server source's non-wildy code is different from most sources and I would love it if someone can tell me how to add non-wildy on my server or do it for me.
Server Base: Project 16

item.title: Fixing Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Well, you see, castelwars is very annoying like that. Because it has 6 ‘levels’, and the client only supports 4, castlewars peices are strewn all about the map.

So I can’t fix it at all?

Read full topic

item.title: Fixing Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

Post this code that is supposedly different from other sources wilderness code.

I never really did anything regarding safe spots, so I looked on this guy’s tutorial on how to add them and I figured that if I know how to add them, I can delete them. But when I searched for the code layout he was using, nothing came up. The tutorial is here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49407.0.html. Basically, I have no nonWild booleans in my server source.

Read full topic
